description:
Enjoy the performance of a backcountry jacket, in a clean urban style. The floating yoke design gives the Greycoast the look of separates, but the coverage of a full-length rain jacket. Technical details include an adjustable hood and fully taped seams for complete waterproof protection. The split hem and 2-way zipper also make it easy to sit down without having to unzip your jacket. When days run long or start early, subtle reflective details help shine out in the dark.

  • As we make the transition to our new logo, the MEC garment you receive may reflect a nod to the past or return to the peaks. The materials and features remain the same, though the logo itself may differ
  • Highly breathable 2.5 layer waterproof material has a DWR finish to protect you from the rain
  • 3-piece, adjustable hood has a short brim
  • Cinchable waist lets you customize the fit
  • 2-way zipper lets you adjust your temperature without exposing yourself to the elements
  • Reflective details
  • Sleeve pocket fits a transit pass and other frequently used cards
  • Generous handwarmer pockets
  • Snap down storm flap stops wind getting through the zipper
  • Split rear hem blends comfort with coverage
  • Regular fit
name: MEC Greycoast Rain Jacket - Women's
